#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    // string str[1001],ravi;
    char str[n][1001],ravi[1001];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%s",str[i]);
    }
    scanf("%s",ravi);
    int low=0,high=n-1,flag=0;
    while(low<=high)
    {
        int mid=low+(high-low+1)/2;
        // cout<<mid<<endl;
        if(strcmp(ravi,str[mid])==0)
        {    flag=1;
            break;
        }
        if(strcmp(ravi,str[mid])>0)
            low=mid+1;
        else
        high=mid-1;
    }
    if(flag==1)
        printf("yes\n");
    else
        printf("no\n");
    
}
 

    return 0;
}
